TopicTitle: Platform Enigma- an off topic chat thread.

Articles.Content: Ask how on earth he exists in the real world.

Ask how on earth he exists in the real world.

He doesn't. he was created in 2006 on the something awful forums in the "let's create paranormal images" thread by Victor Eric "surge"

At least you'd be there to patch up what remains of me.

Hey, I'm a medic not a miracle worker.
If I encountered Slenderman, I would throw every single knife in the building at him. And get eaten alive by him.
Surely you could splint a few dozen broken bones?

Surely you could splint a few dozen broken bones?

Oh yes, surely...

I think the best cure for that is a bullet to the brain or an entire pack of painkillers.
Soooo...no one's gonna comment on the video?

Surely you could splint a few dozen broken bones?

Slenderman "supposedly" eats people alive (in Slender games he does, at least).

Slenderman "supposedly" eats people alive (in Slender games he does, at least).

PFFFFFF, games. Try "Marble Hornets" and he doesn't eat people. He dissects them, takes out their organs, puts them in plastic bags and puts them back into the body. All the while after the've been impaled on a tree branch.
Nah, he impales them on trees.

Hey, I'm a medic not a miracle worker.

*Star Trek-ish reference!*

^w^

Mercy? I think ilu <3
Is ANYONE gonna comment on the darn video!?

Nah, he impales them on trees.

Isn't that for paper? Also, Slenerman "supposedly" kidnaps children (probably kills them after). In most lore he does that.

Is ANYONE gonna comment on the darn video!?
No! Stop asking!

No! Stop asking!

;_; *sniff*

*Star Trek-ish reference!*

^w^

Mercy? I think ilu <3

Well, at least someone noticed.
I noticed too! Trekkette isn't the only one that loves you!

ily 2

both of u

And on that bombshell, it's time for me to say goodnight.

Catch you all tomorrow.
*Suddenly a wild Mguarn ,and his imperial fleet of Rage bots appears* (note there made with water proof circuits)

*Suddenly a wild Mguarn ,and his imperial fleet of Rage bots appears* (note there made with water proof circuits)

Woah, bruh! the heck do you think you're doing?
Back to the Slenderman discussion!

People. Remember Odin's post? Remember her telling us that senseless spam like this will get the thread locked?
Hate having to repeat myself.
So, what if we were Proxies of Slenderman? What will happen?

Found some bits of a former you then thought hey why not create a imperial steam powered robotic Military.*Commands them to take the west coast of the U.s ,and Asia (including Russia)* I managed to mass produce these Imperial troops.Not to mention the factories were on the west coast of the United states.
Explain the proxy concept, this is the first I've heard of it.
